Question
========
Given is the following quadratic sum associated with a repeated measures ANOVA: $SS_{persons} = k * Î£(M_{pi} - M_{grand})^2$. What does the formula say in the parentheses $(M_{pi} - M_{grand})$?

Answerlist
----------
* The deviation of the mean of person *i* from the overall mean.
* The deviation of the mean of time *i* from the overall mean.
* The deviation of the average person from the overall mean.
* The deviation of the mean time from the overall mean.
